Write-Up Text: People are buzzing about the upcoming federal budget in Australia with several concerns and ideas being expressed across social media. The budget's potential impact on Aussies scam text messages the Australian Defence Force and fiscal rules are just some of the topics being discussed. Additionally various questions and calls for increased support on issues such as homelessness and SMS sender ID registry are being raised. The posts also reflect concerns over mounting national debt and the need for balancing the budget.
